patient_data.$comment: All info regarding infected patient. Should be invariant. Probably redundant, all should be already present in the epibaza database.

laboratory_data.$comment: All info regarding sequencing laboratory. Should be invariant. Probably redundant, all should be already present in the epibaza database.

sample_data.$comment: All info regarding material that is sequenced. All variability (dates, places, origin )is put here. Probably redundant, all should be already present in the epibaza database.
